title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: In my application, I obtain the design time instance of the chart and then call a method to run the report. However, after running the report, the chart is not updated with the data as expected. This functionality was working correctly in previous versions of BIRT (before version 2.0), but it is not working as expected in BIRT RC and version 2.0.
